Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Repeals certain provisions of the correction law relating to the transfer of incarcerated individuals from a county jail to a state correctional institution
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the transfer of incarcerated individuals from a county jail to a state correctional institution.
LawCode: Rpld ยง504 sub 2, amd ยง504, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal certain provisions of the correction law relating to the transfer of incarcerated individuals from a county jail to a state correctional institution
